title: Congratulating Brian Wint upon the occasion of his designation as a recipient of the Martin Luther King, Jr. Award for Leadership and Community Service
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating  Brian Wint upon the occasion of
his designation as a recipient of the Martin Luther King, Jr. Award  for
Leadership and Community Service

WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense of this Legislative Body to commend and pay
tribute to those youth of today and leaders of tomorrow whose  character
and  achievements best exemplify the ideals and values cherished by this
great State and Nation; and
  WHEREAS, It is the intent of this  Legislative  Body  to  honor  those
young  people  within  this  great  Empire  State  who  have made strong
contributions to their communities and who  serve  as  role  models  for
their peers; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to  congratu-
late  Brian  Wint upon the occasion of his designation as a recipient of
the Martin Luther King, Jr. Award for Leadership and Community  Service;
and
  WHEREAS,  The  month  of  February  acknowledges  the rich and diverse
heritage of our great State and Nation; Black  History  Month  seeks  to
emphasize that Black History is American History; and
  WHEREAS,  Brian  Wint  has  distinguished  himself through outstanding
success in leadership and community involvement; he is a true  asset  to
society; and
  WHEREAS,  With  his  sense of civic duty and his commitment to others,
Brian Wint represents the best development of  the  potential  which  is
inherent in our most precious resource, our youth; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
congratulate Brian Wint upon the occasion of his designation as a recip-
ient of the Martin Luther King, Jr. Award for Leadership  and  Community
Service; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Brian Wint.
